SEARCH
Package ulb.infof307.g9.controller.mods.free

Class FreeStudyController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.controller.abstracts.Controller
ulb.infof307.g9.controller.mods.study.StudyController
ulb.infof307.g9.controller.mods.free.FreeStudyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardVisitor, FreeMultiChoiceCardController.Listener, CardController.Listener
public class FreeStudyController extends StudyController implements FreeMultiChoiceCardController.Listener
Controller for the free study mode. It extends the study controller and overrides the visit methods for the cards. The free study mode only supports multi choice cards, so the other cards are ignored.

    • pickNextCard

      protected void pickNextCard()
      Picks the next card, and if there is no more card, the game is over. When the game is over, the screen is changed to the score screen.
      Overrides:
      pickNextCard in class StudyController

    • onValidateChoice

      public void onValidateChoice(String answer)
      When the user validates his answer, we check if it is correct. If it is, we increase the number of good answers, and we update the title of the stage.
      Specified by:
      onValidateChoice in interface FreeMultiChoiceCardController.Listener
      Parameters:
